ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Pinot Grigio wine, divided
3/4 cup peach-flavored vodka (such as AbsolutÂ®), divided
1/2 (11.5 ounce) can peach nectar (such as Kern'sÂ®)
des: "Great summer version of sangria for parties and outdoor events. Best made several hours before serving. I usually make the sangria either the night before or the morning of the event. I add the frozen fruit and by the time I serve the sangria they have thawed and soaked up the liquor."
ins:
Place fresh raspberries in a bowl; pour in enough wine and peach-flavored vodka to cover. Let soak, at least 1 hour.
Combine remaining wine, remaining peach-flavored vodka, peach nectar, lemonade concentrate, peach schnapps, and sugar in a large pitcher. Stir in soaked raspberries and mango chunks.
